description: User can send a message and see it appear in the conversation
steps: Open the chat app and navigate to a conversation
Type a message in the composer
Click Send (or press Enter)
Verify the message appears in the message list
Verify the message content matches what was typed
Send a message in a conversation
Refresh the page (or close and reopen the app)
Navigate back to the same conversation
Verify the previously sent message is still visible

description: Real-time incoming messages appear without manual refresh
steps: Open the same conversation in two browser windows (User A and User B)
From User B, send a message to the conversation
On User A, verify the new message appears automatically
Verify ordering places the new message at the end of the conversation

description: Unread count increments and clears when a conversation is opened
steps: Open the chat app in two windows (User A and User B)
On User B, send a message to a conversation that User A is not currently viewing
On User A, verify the conversation shows an unread badge/count
Open that conversation
Verify the unread badge/count clears

description: Typing indicator shows when another user is composing
steps: Open the same conversation in two windows (User A and User B)
On User B, focus the composer and start typing
On User A, verify a typing indicator appears (e.g., 'User B is typing…')
On User B, stop typing for a few seconds
On User A, verify the typing indicator disappears

description: User can search conversations and messages
steps: Ensure there are multiple conversations and messages with distinct keywords
Use the search bar to search for a keyword present in a message
Verify results include the matching conversation/message
Open the result
Verify the matching message is highlighted or scrolled into view

description: Conversation list shows name, last message preview, and timestamp
steps: Open the chat app with existing conversations
Verify each conversation row shows a title/name
Verify a last-message preview is visible
Verify a timestamp for the last message is visible

description: Composer disables Send for empty message and enables when text is present
steps: Open a conversation
Verify the Send button is disabled when the composer is empty
Type at least one character
Verify the Send button becomes enabled
Delete all text
Verify the Send button becomes disabled again
